name: xumm-sample-app
description: Simple Poc app for xumm sdk integration'

scripts.test: cross-env IS_TESTING=true mocha --require tests/fixtures.test.js --require tests/teardown.test.js ./*/test/*.test.js --reporter mochawesome -options reportDir=testReports,reportFilename=automatedTestReports --timeout 250000 --exit --bail

author: sachin-kiwi
